M1000-1.question: Is your usual dietary intake within within the normal and healthy limits?
M1000-1.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false

M1000-2.question: Do you have difficulty in chewing or swallowing food?
M1000-2.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false

M1000-3.question: Have you noticed any significant decrease in your appetite recently?
M1000-3.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-4.question: Have you experienced any noticeable changes in your weight recently, such as unintentional weight loss or gain?
M1000-4.instructions: select Loss if loss of weigth, Gain if gain of wieght otherwise None

M1000-5.question: Are you ensuring that your meals are prepared and handled appropriately to maintain good hygiene and prevent food-related issues?
M1000-5.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-6.question: Are you following proper diet?
M1000-6.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-7.question: Is your diet adequate or inadequate?
M1000-7.instructions: Adequate if diet is adequate, inadequate if diet is inadiquate otherwise None

M1000-8.question: Have you ever had a Nasogastric (NG) tube inserted for medical purposes?
M1000-8.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-9.question: Have you ever had a Percutaneous Endoscopic Gastrostomy (PEG) tube placed for nutritional support?
M1000-9.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-10.question: Have you ever been fitted with a Dobhoff tube for nutritional support?
M1000-10.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-11.question: Have the placement and functionality of the tube, whether it's a PEG tube, Dobhoff tube, or another type, been regularly checked and verified?
M1000-11.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-12.question: Have the residual volumes in the feeding tube been regularly checked?
M1000-12.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-13.question: Do you have any throat problems?
M1000-13.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-14.question: Have you experienced any hoarseness or changes in your voice recently?
M1000-14.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-15.question: Do you have sore throat?
M1000-15.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-16.question: Are you having any dental problems?
M1000-16.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-17.question: Do you currently use dentures?
M1000-17.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-18.question: Are you facing any problem in chewing food?
M1000-18.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-19.question: Do you feel any other issues?
M1000-19.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-20.question: Have you lost more than 10 lbs in last 3 months without any reason?
M1000-20.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-21.question: Do you have any illness or any condition which made you change the type and amount of food eaten?
M1000-21.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-22.question: Do you have any open decubitus, ulcer, burn or wound?
M1000-22.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-23.question: Do you eat less than 2 meals a day?
M1000-23.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-24.question: Do you have any food or mouth problem which makes it hard to eat food?
M1000-24.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-25.question: Do you have 3 or more drinks of beer liquor or wine almost everyday?
M1000-25.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-26.question: Do you have insufficient money to buy food everyday?
M1000-26.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-27.question: Do you eat few of fruits, vegetables or milk products?
M1000-27.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-28.question: Do you eat alone most of the time?
M1000-28.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-29.question: Do you take 3 or more prescibed or OTC medications a day?
M1000-29.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-30.question: Are you physcially able to make and feed yourself without any assistance from caregiver?
M1000-30.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-31.question: Have you been experiencing frequent episodes of diarrhea or constipation lately?
M1000-31.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-32.question: Is patient's nutritional status good?
M1000-32.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-33.question: Is patient at moderate nutritional risk?
M1000-33.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-34.question: Is patient at high nutritional risk?
M1000-34.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-35.question: Is patient non-compliant with prescribed diet?
M1000-35.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-36.question: Is patient over or underweight by 10%?
M1000-36.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-37.question: Do you require parental or IV feeding?
M1000-37.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-38.question: Do you use any feeding tubes?
M1000-38.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-39.question: Do you need change in texture of foods or liquid before consumption?
M1000-39.instructions: if yes, select true else false

M1000-40.question: Do you follow therapeutic diet like low salt, diabetic or low cholestrol?
M1000-40.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false

M1000-41.question: Are none of the above four points applicable?
M1000-41.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false

M1000-42.question: Were you not assessed?
M1000-42.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false

M1870.question: Are you able to feed yourself independently and safely?
M1870.instructions: select 0 if you are able to feed yourself independently, 1 if you are able to feeb independently but require intermittent assistance or meal setup or liquid/pureed/ground meet diet, 2 if you are unable to feed yourself and must be assisted or supervised throughout meal, 3 if you are able to take in nutrients orally and receive supplimental nutrients through tube or gastrostomy, 4 if you are unable to take in nutrients orally and receive supplimental nutrients through tube or gastrostomy, 5 if you are unable to take in nutrients orally or by tube feeding

M1000-58.instructions: if yes, select true otherwise false
